autopilot-ip.title: IP address of the drone's autopilot
autopilot-ip.description: IP used to create a connection with the autopilot.

is-a-simulation.title: Set the flight as a simulation
is-a-simulation.description: The option used to determine if the flight is real or if it is a simulation. This affects the context of the flight (e.g. if the take off is manual or automatic).

multicast-ipv6.title: IP of the multicast group
multicast-ipv6.description: IP address used to communicate with the other drones.

drone-id-list.title: List of drones IDs
drone-id-list.description: Comma separated list of identifiers of drones.

flight-script.title: Script of the flight
flight-script.description: Script which will be executed for the flight
